lines.text: create int n and int arrays a of size 30 and cnt of size 3
for i = 0 to n - 1 , read a [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i <= n - 1 ; i ++ ) cin >> a [ i ] ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to 2 , set cnt [ i ] to 0
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i <= 2 ; i ++ ) cnt [ i ] = 0 ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to n - 1 , set cnt [ i % 3 ] to cnt [ i % 3 ] + a [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i <= n - 1 ; i ++ ) cnt [ i % 3 ] += a [ i ] ;

lines.text: if cnt [ 0 ] is greater than cnt [ 1 ] and cnt [ 0 ] is greater than cnt [ 2 ] , print " chest \ n "
lines.code: if ( cnt [ 0 ] > cnt [ 1 ] && cnt [ 0 ] > cnt [ 2 ] ) cout << " chest\n " ;

lines.text: if cnt [ 1 ] is greater than cnt [ 0 ] and cnt [ 1 ] is greater than cnt [ 2 ] , print " biceps \ n "
lines.code: if ( cnt [ 1 ] > cnt [ 0 ] && cnt [ 1 ] > cnt [ 2 ] ) cout << " biceps\n " ;

lines.text: if cnt [ 2 ] is greater than cnt [ 0 ] and cnt [ 2 ] is greater than cnt [ 1 ] , print " back \ n "
lines.code: if ( cnt [ 2 ] > cnt [ 0 ] && cnt [ 2 ] > cnt [ 1 ] ) cout << " back\n " ;

errors.err_msg: expression cannot be used as a function
